plot: A girl's quest for love is thwarted because of her inability to kiss anyone without turning them into stone. When she finally finds true love, she must have the curse removed.
title: Pretty Poison
plot_es: A girl's quest for love is thwarted because of her inability to kiss anyone without turning them into stone. When she finally finds true love, she must have the curse removed.
plot_en: A girl's quest for love is thwarted because of her inability to kiss anyone without turning them into stone. When she finally finds true love, she must have the curse removed.
